body_html: @mrry Thanks for the quick response! Haven't realized that "tf.device" was ignored here. I'm now getting 900 MB/s which is pretty good. So it looks like deserializing gRPC into Python is slow (<1 Gbps regardless of number of cores) and should be avoided. @JianbangZ are you by chance fetching large tensors in your Python client?

body: @mrry Thanks for the quick response! Haven't realized that "tf.device" was ignored here.  I'm now getting 900 MB/s which is pretty good. So it looks like deserializing gRPC into Python is slow (<1 Gbps regardless of number of cores) and should be avoided. @JianbangZ are you by chance fetching large tensors in your Python client?
